item.title: Backup & Restore wallet
item.description: Your funds are backed up by Recovery Phrase (~ mnemonic seed) during wallet creation and that is enough to keep your coins safe. However if you want to backup all the additional data like addresses saved in Address Book and more, you’ll need to backup your wallet.dat file. Always backup your wallet.dat to a secure place (USB, external drive etc.) â€“ if anyone would get access to it and knew your wallet password, they could steal your coins!
